Package de.unlixx.runpng.util.undo

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    UndoListener
    UndoListener interface to listen to the UndoManager.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Undoable<T>
    An abstract Undoable class.
    UndoableCollection
    This is an Undoable which collects Undoables for the sake to undo or redo them all at once.
    UndoableIntegerSpinner
    This is an Undoable which is specialized for the use with Spinner objects.
    UndoableTextInput
    This is an Undoable which is specialized for the use with TextInputControl objects.
    UndoableToggleGroup
    This is an Undoable which is specialized for the use with ToggleGroup objects.
    UndoEvent
    A simple event object which is passed to listeners which implement the UndoListener interface and are added to the UndoManager.
    UndoManager
    This is the manager class for all undo and redo actions.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Undoable.STATUS  
    UndoManager.TYPE
